channel.title: FOSS on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in FOSS on Inductive Bias

item.title: Apache Breakfast
item.description: Apache Breakfast # In case you missed it but are living in Berlin - or are visiting Berlin/ Germany this week: A handful of Apache people (committers/ members) are meeting over breakfast on Friday morning this week. If you are interested in joining, please let me know (or check yourself - in the archives of the mailing list party@apache.org)
